edinburgh_LQ.Description: handedness laterality quotient of the subject assessed by Edinburgh handedness inventory

recruite_Criteria.Description: recruting criterion used to recruit the subject

Levels.Expert: top 20% rank holder in AtCoder community
Levels.Middle: top 21-50% rank holder in AtCoder community
Levels.Novice: novice controls with four years or less programming experiences

atCoder_Rate.Description: AtCoder rate of the subject indicating how much he/she can perform well in AtCoder competitive programming contests

performance_Training.Description: behavioral performance of subject on training session in the experiment

performance_MRI.Description: behavioral performance of subject on fMRI session in the experiment

performance_Subcategory.Description: behavioral performance of subject on post MRI session in the experiment
